titleStmt.title: To the meek and open hearted lambes, and flock of heaven, in meekness of love, with greetings of peace from the seat of infinite mercy; tendered unto and sent to be read among them all, who live in the humble state.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.
Baley, Charles.

notesStmt.note: Signed Humphrey Smith on p. 5 and H.S. on p. 6.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
P. 7 signed: ... Charles Baley, seen and given forth in Dover prison the 15th day of the 1 month, 1661.
Reproduction of original in: British Library, London, England.
